monogr.title: The Pastoral Care of the Syro-Malabar Catholic Migrants

series.title: Oriental Institute of Religious Studies India Publications 170

biblStruct.note: The author's Ph.D. work in Rome first traces the history of the Syro-Malabar Church and with a focus on migratory movements. The second section deals with rites and the different rites acceptable in the Roman Catholic communion in India. The third section then analyses all the main sources on pastoral care of both Latin and Oriental migrants. The fourth section considers specific ecclesiastical structures and offices for providing pastoral care to Syro-Malabar migrants. The conclusion lists practical suggestions. With a bibliography and index.

body.bibl: Arampulickal, James. The Pastoral Care of the Syro-Malabar Catholic Migrants. Oriental Institute of Religious Studies India Publications 170. Kottayam: Oriental Institute of Religious Studies, 1994.
James Arampulickal, The Pastoral Care of the Syro-Malabar Catholic Migrants, Oriental Institute of Religious Studies India Publications 170 (Kottayam: Oriental Institute of Religious Studies, 1994).
